items.description: Creates a new Page object and attaches it to a parent DOM element.
Sets the main title of the page, which is also reflected in the browser tab.
Sets the secondary title (subtitle) of the page, shown on the right side of the header.
Sets a status indicator with a specific label and color (e.g., 'orange', 'green', 'red').
Sets the primary action button (the main blue button) with a label, handler function, and an optional icon.
Sets the secondary action button (the grey button) with a label, handler, and optional icon.
Adds an item to the 'Menu' dropdown in the page header.
Adds an item to the 'Actions' dropdown in the page header.
Adds a button to the inner toolbar of the page. Can be grouped into a dropdown.
Adds a form control (field) to the page's header toolbar.
Returns an object containing the current values of all fields in the page's header toolbar.
Removes all fields from the page's header toolbar.
